short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clip and share the last 30 seconds of a YouTube video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your YouTube experience with the YouTube Clipper! This user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to effortlessly create and share customized video clips from your favorite YouTube videos. Whether you're looking to highlight a funny moment, an insightful quote, or a crucial scene, our extension empowers you to specify start and end times, generating a unique shareable link in the format of the embedded player. 

Features:
Simple Interface -  Quickly clip the last 30 seconds of any YouTube video with just a few clicks.
Easy Sharing - Generate shareable links that work seamlessly with embedded players.
Quick View -  Preview your generated clip with one click.

Current Extension Limitations: 
. Extension does not work for live streams. 
. The generated clip url can not be accessed through the Youtube mobile app.
